skills.name: Fireball
skills.description: 发射一颗火球，造成大范围伤害

skills.name: FrostNova
skills.description: 释放冰霜能量，冻结周围敌人

skills.name: ArcaneMissiles
skills.description: 释放奥术飞弹，连续攻击敌人

skills.name: MeteorShower
skills.description: 召唤陨石雨，对范围内的敌人造成巨大伤害

skills.name: LightningBolt
skills.description: 释放闪电箭，对单个敌人造成伤害

skills.name: SummonElemental
skills.description: 召唤元素生物作为盟友，并攻击敌人

skills.name: TimeWarp
skills.description: 扭曲时间，加速自己的行动速度

skills.name: Explosion
skills.description: 引爆目标，造成范围性伤害

skills.name: ArcaneBarrier
skills.description: 创建一道奥术屏障，减少受到的伤害
